title: FS/FT: A few vintage postcards (Exhibits, Columbus, Michigan teams)
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS/FT: A few vintage postcards (Exhibits, Columbus, Michigan teams)
posts.post_content:
I think several of these are from town teams local to Michigan.   

Alanson (Michigan) - $25
Kelsey Corp (Michigan Wheel Manufacturer) - $20
Mundus (Detroit Michigan Brewery) - $25
Columbus 1906 Team - $35 (contains several players in the T206 set) 
Exhibits of Boudreau, Greenberg, Lombardi - clean backs and fronts (scans have a sheen) - $35 for all three 

Or take all 7 that for $125 shipped.  Individual prices include shipping.  Thanks for looking.  Email with any questions.

Eric

I'll take the Tri State..



[quote name="Angyale" post=1498963]I think several of these are from town teams local to Michigan/Indiana/Ohio.  The Shoshone team is from Lenappi. 

Alanson (Michigan) - $30
Sam Crawford (AC Dietsche) - $120
Father & Son - $25
Kelsey Corp - $30
Lavigne Mfg. - $35
Mundus (Brewery) - $35
Senecas - $30
Shoshone Reservation Team - $35
York Tri-State League Team - $30

Or take them all for $325 shipped.  Individual prices include shipping.  Thanks for looking.  Email with any questions.

Eric[/QUOTE]

I'll take Shoshone and LaVigne Mfr.

[url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url].

Thank you,
Mike

I'd like Father & Son and Senecas pitcher.

David McDonald
